DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Tolerability Escitalopram Duloxetine Outpatients With Major Depressive Disorder
DOC.detailed_description: Depression common mental disorder present depress mood , loss interest pleasure , disturbed sleep appetite , low energy , feeling guilt low self-worth , poor concentration . The lifetime prevalence Major Depressive Disorder ( MDD ) community sample 10-25 % woman 5-12 % men . Depression may become chronic recurrent lead substantial impairment individual 's ability take care everyday responsibility . At bad , depression may lead suicide . Depression recurrent 75-80 % patient become chronic 15-20 % depressed patient . The selective serotonin reuptake inhibitor ( SSRIs ) become leading class antidepressant throughout world . The efficacy safety SSRIs treatment depression demonstrate several clinical trial . With respect safety , study show advantage SSRIs old antidepressant . If prescribing physician make well-founded judgement choice drug factor like efficacy , safety , quality life , health economics must take consideration . The primary aim study compare efficacy escitalopram serotonin norepinephrine reuptake inhibitor ( SNRIs ) duloxetine treatment MDD .
DOC.criteria: The patient suffers primary diagnosis MDD accord DSMIVTR criterion ( classification code 296.xx ; current episode assess use MINI ) The patient MADRS total score > =26 CGIS score > =4 Baseline Visit Any current psychiatric disorder MDD define DSMIV TR Female patient childbearing potential use effective contraception Use psychoactive medication 2 week prior screen study Other protocoldefined inclusion exclusion criterion may apply .
